meanings.definition: The kidney-shaped nut of a tropical American tree, often roasted and salted as a snack.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on a crunchy cashew.
meanings.sent2: She added cashews to the salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cashew jumped out of the bowl and did a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a cashew in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted cashews filled the room.

meanings.definition: The tropical American tree that bears the cashew nut.
meanings.sent1: The cashew tree provides shade in the hot climate.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest cashews from the trees every year.
meanings.sent3: The cashew tree whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the cashew tree reached for the sky like fingers.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the cashew tree shimmered in the sunlight.
